Producer: Sébastien Delloye, Philipp Kreuzer, Jörg Schulze
Production Co: Proximus, Cine Plus Filmproduktion, Maze Pictures, Palomar, RTBF, Entre Chien et Loup, Tele München Gruppe
Synopsis: His body ailing, Oscar Wilde lives in exile, surviving on the flamboyant irony and brilliant wit that defined him.
Title: The Happy Prince
